Package edu.sjsu.cs151.tetris.model

Class GameRule

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.sjsu.cs151.tetris.model.GameRule
  • public class GameRule
extends java.lang.Object
    A class for creating a play field with a 2D grid of size height x width that can spawn in Tetrominos, and award points to the player when necessary. The default playfield is (Height x Width) = 20 x 10. This class also contains all game rules
    Author:
    Luksawee, Nick

      • rotateRight

        public void rotateRight()
        Method changes rotation number to greater one. If it is 4 it is changed to 0.

      • rotateLeft

        public void rotateLeft()
        Method changes rotation number to lower one. If it is lower than 0 it is changed to 3.

      • removeFullLines

        public boolean removeFullLines()
        Method to check the line is getting full or not? If the line is full, we remove that line and out, and move the top line down. We also add point when we remove the line.
        Returns:
        Amount of full lines detected.

      • isOver

        public boolean isOver()
        Method checks if the game is lost (is any figure's block on forbidden place).
        Returns:
        true if game is lost, false if it is not.

      • figureCopy

        public void figureCopy()
        After the figure fell down to the bottom, we copy every figure.

        Method to return the 2D array containing the game board data
        Returns:
        boardToPlayer Two dimensional array with all data.
